panels.title: Number of eth Namespace Requests per Second

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (rate(reth_rpc_server_calls_time_seconds_sum{node_type="sequencer", method=~"eth_.*"}[5m])) / sum by(instance) (rate(reth_rpc_server_calls_time_seconds_count{node_type="sequencer", method=~"eth_.*"}[5m]))

panels.title: Average eth Namespace Request Response Time
Number of eth Namespace Requests per Second

targets.expr:
sum by (instance) (
  rate(reth_rpc_server_calls_time_seconds_sum{instance=~"$instance", method=~"eth_.*"}[5m])
)
/
sum by (instance) (
  rate(reth_rpc_server_calls_time_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", method=~"eth_.*"}[5m])
)
